page.title: 11THE VILLAGE HALL,CARBOST
page.content: The village hall is the only place which has a stage and a large crowd of people can meet.It is used mainly for dances and Bring and Buy sales.During the winter,there is a Junior Youth Club on Fridays and a Senior Youth Club on Saturdays. At Christmas time local people put on a Pantomime,written by themselves.Everyone enjoys it,and the hall is usually packed full! Sometimes the school puts on a concert or plays for the village and the local Drama Group use the hall to rehearse there for a yearly competition held in the Isle of Skye,usually in Broadford. The community raised funds to add an extension to the hall,an extra little room,which can be used for different things,like storage,meetings,table tennis and now a pool table.
